thread.title: Hulu-Spotify Bundle Now Available for $12.99 a Month | Fortune

author: Don Reisinger
title: Hulu-Spotify Bundle Now Available for $12.99 a Month | Fortune
text:
By Don Reisinger April 11, 2018 
Hulu and Spotify have expanded their partnership with a new bundle that aims at getting more users to sign up for their streaming services. 
Between now and May 10, customers can sign up for a streaming bundle that includes unlimited access to both Hulu and Spotify for just $12.99 a month. The first three months are available for 99 cents a month as part of a promotion to get customers to sign up for the service. 
Hulu and Spotify started partnering on bundles back in September when they offered a subscription option to students. However, that bundle was available for $4.99 a month . 
Get Data Sheet , Fortune’s technology newsletter 
The new bundle is a nice savings on the individual plans you’d need to pay for each service. Spotify Premium costs $9.99 per month and Hulu goes for $7.99 per month. Even at $12.99 for the bundle, customers are able to save $5 per month. 
The move could be a boon for those who often stream content and want access to both video and audio. And it could be a shot over the bow of Netflix and Apple Music, which compete with the services and don’t have a similar bundle option. 
But before you sign up, there are some caveats. The service is currently only available to Spotify Premium subscribers. Those who have an existing Hulu subscription can also take advantage of the service if they switch billing to Spotify. SPONSORED FINANCIAL CONTENT
